dcterms:creator: Da Li
Yongxin Yang
Yi-Zhe Song
Timothy M Hospedales
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of four domains: Photos, Art, Cartoon, and Sketch, containing 9,991 images in 7 classes, used for evaluating domain generalization methods.
dcterms:title: PACS

dcterms:creator: Chen Fang
Ye Xu
Daniel N Rockmore
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes images from four domains: VOC2007, LabelMe, Caltech, and SUN09, containing 10,729 images in 5 classes, used for unbiased metric learning.
dcterms:title: VLCS

dcterms:creator: Hemanth Venkateswara
Jose Eusebio
Shayok Chakraborty
Sethuraman Panchanathan
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of four domains: Art, Clipart, Product, and Real, containing 15,588 images in 65 classes, used for unsupervised domain adaptation.
dcterms:title: OfficeHome

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Thomas Dietterich
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for evaluating the robustness of neural networks against common corruptions and perturbations, consisting of corrupted images across 15 types of corruption.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-C
